content: adorned 5 92tr 32ch-sps with the rs facing rejoin yarn d into the row 16 join yarn b ch4 counts as 1tr and chain-1 space at the end of row 19 ch62 1ch 3tr into first chain-space ch1 3tr into work as row 1 next chain-space ch1 13 times 3tr ch2 3tr weave in all ends into chain-2 space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 14 times times ch1 1tr turn fasten_off 98tr 34ch-sps row 17 join yarn c ch4 counts as 1tr and 1ch 3tr into first chain-space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 14 times 3tr ch2 3tr into chain-2 space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 15 times times ch1 1tr turn fasten_off 104tr 36ch-sps row 18 join yarn b ch4 counts as 1tr and 1ch 3tr into first chain-space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 15 times 3tr ch2 3tr into chain-2 space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 16 times times ch1 1tr turn fasten_off 110tr 38ch-sps row 19 rs join yarn d ch4 counts as 1tr and 1ch 3tr into first chain-space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 16 times 3tr ch2 3tr into chain-2 space ch1 3tr into next chain-space ch1 17 times times ch1 1tr turn fasten_off 116tr 40ch-sps ties for more patterns from to be adorned or with the rs facing join yarn d into the finished accessories ready to buy visit chain-1 space at the start of row 19 ch62 https //tobeadorned square site row 1 rs starting in the second chain from please follow and tag me in your makes the hook 60dc fasten_off 62dc online @tobeadorned i d love to see ©becca parker to be adorned 2024 all rights reserved for personal and non-commercial use only please credit to be adorned when using this pattern
